title: How to unsubscribe from Peacock
description: You can cancel your Peacock subscription online through their website or through your third-party provider (e.g., Apple, Amazon, Roku, Xfinity). Canceling the subscription will stop future payments. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing cycle.

web.title: Cancel Peacock Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Peacock subscription via their website:

*   Go to peacocktv.com and sign in to your account.
*   Select your profile icon in the top right corner.
*   Click on Account.
*   Navigate to Plans & Payments and select Change or Cancel Plan.
*   Select Cancel Plan and confirm your cancellation.

app_ios.title: Cancel Peacock Subscription via Apple/iOS
app_ios.description:
To cancel your Peacock subscription via Apple/iOS:

*   Go to Settings > [Your Name] > Subscriptions.

app_amazon.title: Cancel Peacock Subscription via Amazon/Fire TV
app_amazon.description:
To cancel your Peacock subscription via Amazon/Fire TV:

*   Go to Apps > Appstore > Subscriptions.

app_roku.title: Cancel Peacock Subscription via Roku
app_roku.description:
To cancel your Peacock subscription via Roku:

*   Go to the Home screen.
*   Select the Peacock channel.
*   Press the * button on your remote.
*   Select Manage Subscription.
*   Turn off auto-renew.
